title: Young and Beautiful
overview: Liu Wen Jing Jing moves from the countryside of Shanxi Province to the big city of Shanghai and makes new friends. For the next ten years, they will all try to make their dreams come true. Wen Jing loses herself along the way, making wrong decisions that have cost her the trust of loved ones. She begins to understand what true happiness is, and embarks on the path of remorse, restoring her former self and smoothing differences with family and friends.
